clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial on Effectiveness and Safety of Hydrogen Generator to Treat Dyspnea for the Patients With Tracheal Stenosis: A Randomized, Double-blind and Single-center Clinical Study
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Trial on Effectiveness and Safety of Inhaling Hydrogen-oxygen to Decreases Inspiratory Effort for the Patients With Tracheal Stenosis: A Randomized, Double-blind and Single-center Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: Investigators aim to study the effectiveness and safety of inhaling hydrogen-oxygen which produced by a hydrogen generator with nebulizer to decreases inspiratory effort for the patients with tracheal stenosis.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in sRMSdi/para/sc, RMSdi, Pdi& MIP from baseline after inhalation by bench study.
primary_outcome.description: sRMSdi/para/sc: root-mean-square of diaphragm/parasternal/sternocleidomastoid surface electromyography; RMSdi: root-mean-square of diaphragm electromyography; Pdi: Transdiaphragmatic pressure; MIP:maximal inspiratory pressure.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Borg score for dyspnea after inhalation.
Change in symptom of dyspnea from baseline after inhalation.
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in comfort with each gas mixture were evaluated by a simple questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in signs(BR, HR, BP, el) from baseline after inhalation
secondary_outcome.description: Change in signs include breath rate， heart rate， blood pressure，Three Depression Sign and so on.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in PaO2, PaCO2, PH& HCO3- after inhalation

secondary_outcome.description: Forced expiratory volume in one second & Forced vital capacity.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in impulse oscillometry variables(R5,R20,X5,AX,RF) as change from baseline when inhaling.
secondary_outcome.description: R5 - Resistance at 5Hz, R20 - Resistance at 20Hz, X5 - Reactance at 5Hz, RF - Frequency of resonance, AX - Area under reactance curve

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in cough waves from baseline when inhaling
secondary_outcome.description: Cough waves will be recorded by a voice recorder.

secondary_outcome.measure: Grades of airway stenosis by bronchoscopy

intervention.description: The patients mainly used the hydrogen generator with nebulizer for inhalation of hydrogen-oxygen mixed gas.
The patients mainly used medical molecular sieve oxygen-making machine for oxygen inhalation.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor of Guangzhou Institute of Respiratory Disease

clinical_study.keyword: Tracheal stenosis, Hydrogen generator, Hydrogen-oxygen, Dyspnea.
